channel.title: Home on the way we R
channel.description: Recent content in Home on the way we R

item.title: {cranstars}: a first golem app & possibly, CRAN!
item.description: A simple shiny app made with the {golem} framework.

item.title: {datamods}: Shiny modules to import data
item.description: Custom-made modules to import data into your Shiny app. Overview This is an R package that provides pre-built custom shiny modules to import data from various sources into a Shiny app. The modules can be used in any standard shiny app. Just plug in the ui and server functions in the right place to make them work. There are four modules at the moment. import-globalenv import-file import-copypaste import-googlesheets Further readings on github

item.title: The Resume Plot
item.description: A ggplot2 implementation of an extraordinary plot from a great book.

item.title: Making of the website: A tribute
item.description: A tribute to the ones who inspired me while making the website.

item.title: Zauad Shahreer Abeer
item.description: People typically add their degrees after their name. It’s a way to show their achievements and they are usually proud of it. I can’t say I’m different. Study without desire spoils the memory, and it retains nothing that it takes in. – Leonardo da Vinci Programming has always intrigued me. Owing to mediocre results in the admission exam, I was not given the option to choose CSE as a major.
